Feb. 2, 1938 D Australian Championships (A Grade)
Australian Championships (A Grade) 10 Sacred, March, Set Test and Own Choice Contest Australian Championships australian-championships-a-grade
Australia
A Grade
Set Test and Own Choice
Robin Hood [Geehl]
Sydney Sports Ground, Sydney, New South Wales, Australia The 3 adjudicators independently awarded points and and the position that the band were placed points were awarded accordingly IE 1st pl =11pts ; 2nd pl ==10 pts ; 3rd pl = 9 pts descending to 11th pl =1pt
